content: The point is, not only does this blueprint have the appearance of the house, it also comes with designs of a full set of furniture.

content: Hohoho~! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, I know this is a personal ask, but I hope that you'll make some time to take care of Frostia as you build your new home.

content: To achieve this dream, I've spent nights studying the stars and made some... vague predictions using what I've learned. Only when I was almost certain, did I dare present this blueprint.

content: No, no, it's fine. It's just that I sense that accomplishing this dream may be a bit difficult for me. I wonder if I can do it with more time... Mobai?

content: Frostia's concern over the difficulty of the construction is normal. Most neighbors feel lost when starting their independent new life — That's why Loomi Co. developed the <color=#8AAB4B>Dream Builder Box</color>.
info: 介绍梦想家-莫白_安居线

content: With the Dream Builder Box, we can utilize the power of unity and quickly assemble the supplies needed for the house, aiding the neighbors who need extra help.

content: You're also working hard for your new home, so I can't help but feel like I am adding weight to your shoulders again...

content: After coming here, whether it's looking for a spot to set up my tent or with the Ecoglobe, I've called for your help on so many things, and I feel indebted.
